attributes.action: Re open the Railway line between Matlock, Bakewell and Buxton
attributes.additional_details:
The 8 mile section of track is currently used as a walking route but if reenstated it would directly link Manchester with London as it used to and offer a great alternative to passanger lines and freight.
Also it would serve the residents of the Peak District as well as help get more tourists in and out with less congestion.

Please show your support
